\begin{align}\label{sumki} A_1 &:= \sum_{x/2 \leq n \leq x-2} \Lambda_{a,q}(n) \mathbf{1}_{(n+2,P(x^{1/8}))=1}, \\
A_{2,p} &:= \sum_{\substack{ x/2 \leq n \leq x-2 \\ p|n+2}} \Lambda_{a,q}(n) \mathbf{1}_{(n+2,P(x^{1/8}))=1},  \\
A_3 &:= \sum_{x/2 \leq n \leq x-2} \Lambda_{a,q}(n) \sum_{x^{1/8} \leq p_1 \leq x^{1/3} < p_2 \leq p_3}  \mathbf{1}_{n+2=p_1p_2p_3}. \\
A_{4,p} &:= \sum_{\substack{ x/2 \leq n \leq x-2 \\ p^2|n+2}} \Lambda_{a,q}(n) \mathbf{1}_{(n+2,P(x^{1/8}))=1}, 
\end{align}
